name: Home Fantasy (No2)
address: 115B Thuy Khue, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Offering a sun terrace and views of the lake, Home Fantasy (No2) is located in Hanoi in the Ha Noi Municipality Region, 1 km from One Pillar Pagoda. Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum is 1 km from the property. Free WiFi is featured and free private parking is available on site.

All units include a satellite flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area and/or terrace. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a microwave. A fridge and kettle are also offered. Towels are available.

Quan Thanh Temple is 1.1 km from Home Fantasy (No2). The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 19 km from Home Fantasy (No2).
